name: One Little Habit 3 Remade
description:
Every habit, has an origin. Experience and explore the very first establishment, called Habit's Hungry Diner. Find out what happend to your brother. But be careful, after you walk in that place, a certain someone will return.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The remake of the most interesting game in the series. I wanted to remake this one because I thought I could take a new direction with it. Little did I know, it would take the WHOLE summer to make this game. Anyways, I hope you enjoy the recreated (and story driven) version of OLH 3!
